com.viaoa.jfc
Class OAPopupDateChooser

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.viaoa.jfc.OADateChooser
                      com.viaoa.jfc.OAPopupDateChooser
All Implemented Interfaces:
OAJFCComponent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class OAPopupDateChooser
extends OADateChooser

Popup calendar that is bound to a property in a Hub. A button can be setup that will automatically popup the OADateChooser.

Example:
OAPopupDateChooser dc = new OAPopupDateChooser(hubEmployee, "hireDate"); JButton cmd = new JButton("Set Date"); dc.setButton(cmd); -- or -- OACommand cmd = new OACommand(hubEmployee); dc.setButton(cmd);

For more information about this package, see documentation.

See Also:
OAPopup, OADateChooser, Serialized Form
